biotools.summary:
COVID-19 Scenarios is an interactive tool to explore the spread and associated morbidity and mortality of SARS-CoV-2. This tool is based on the SIR model  that simulates a COVID19 outbreak. 
The primary purpose of the tool is to explore the dynamics of COVID19 cases and the associated strain on the health care system in the near future.
